mapper.select:
SELECT a.APPL_NO APPL_NO,a.USER_ID, a.APPL_ID, H.ADMS_TYPE, F.CAMP_NAME, e.COLL_NAME, b.DEPT_NAME, a.CORS_TYPE_CODE, d.ARI_INST_NAME,a.DETL_MAJ_CODE,a.INP_DETL_MAJ,a.KOR_NAME,a.ENG_SUR,a.ENG_NAME, a.RGST_NO, a.RGST_BORN_DATE, a.BORN_DAY,a.CITZ_CNTR_CODE, a.FORN_TYPE_CODE, a.GEND, a.MOBI_NUM,a.MAIL_ADDR FROM APPL a left outer join ARI_INST d on a.ARI_INST_CODE = d.ARI_INST_CODE , DEPT b, COLL e, CAMP F, ADMS H where 1=1 AND a.DEPT_CODE = b.DEPT_CODE AND b.COLL_CODE= e.COLL_CODE AND e.CAMP_CODE = F.CAMP_CODE AND a.ADMS_NO = H.ADMS_NO AND a.APPL_NO = #{applNo}
ORDER BY APPL_ID DESC, APPL_NO DESC

select APPL_NO, DOC_SEQ, DOC_ITEM_CODE, DOC_ITEM_NAME, DOC_NAME, FILE_EXT, IMG_YN, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE from APPL_DOC
where APPL_NO = #{applNo}

SELECT A.DEPT_CODE, B.DEPT_NAME, B.DEPT_NAME_XXEN FROM ADMS_DEPT A, DEPT B WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE AND A.ADMS_NO = #{admsNo} AND B.COLL_CODE = #{collCode} AND ( A.ADMS_NO ='Y' OR A.ARI_YN ='Y' OR A.COM_YN ='Y') ORDER BY B.DEPT_SEQ

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPL WHERE ADMS_NO IN (#{general,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foreign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{early,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND APPL_STS_CODE IN ( '00010', '00021')) UNPAID_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPL WHERE ADMS_NO IN (#{general,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foreign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{early,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND APPL_STS_CODE IN ( '00001', '00002', '00003', '00004')) UNCMPL_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) CURR_CNT FROM APPL WHERE ADMS_NO IN (#{general,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foreign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{early,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND APPL_STS_CODE IN ( '00020') ) CURR_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPL_CHG WHERE ADMS_NO IN (#{general,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foreign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{early,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND CHG_STS_CODE ='00003') CHANGE_CNT FROM DUAL
SELECT A.APPL_DATE, COUNT(*) totalCnt FROM( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(APPL_DATE, '%Y%m%d') AS APPL_DATE, APPL_ID FROM APPL WHERE APPL_STS_CODE ='00020') A GROUP BY APPL_DATE ORDER BY APPL_DATE DESC

SELECT A.ADMS_NO, A.ADMS_TYPE_CODE, A.APPL_ATTR_CODE, COUNT(CASE WHEN CORS_TYPE_CODE IN('01', '05','07','10') THEN 1 END) AS CNT1, COUNT(CASE WHEN CORS_TYPE_CODE IN('02', '06','08','11') THEN 1 END) AS CNT2, COUNT(CASE WHEN CORS_TYPE_CODE IN('03', '04','12') THEN 1 END) AS CNT3, COUNT(CASE WHEN CORS_TYPE_CODE IN('09') THEN 1 END) AS CNT4, COUNT(A.CORS_TYPE_CODE ) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM APPL A WHERE A.APPL_STS_CODE = '00020' GROUP BY A.ADMS_NO, A.ADMS_TYPE_CODE, A.APPL_ATTR_CODE
SELECT DISTINCT(ADMS_NO) CODE, COUNT(*) CNT FROM APPL A WHERE A.APPL_STS_CODE = '00020' GROUP BY ADMS_NO
